Reviews.Title: It fits Canon SX50 too
Reviews.Author: Chi.L
Reviews.Content: I Had a Canon SX50, This lens conversion adapter fit the SX50 nicely, once you fit the adapter in, you have to turn 1/4 of circle to prevent it fall off.

Reviews.Title: Fits the SX30IS Perfectly!!!
Reviews.Author: Wayne Dennis
Reviews.Content: Excellent fit and finish for the Cannon SX30IS.I had purchased some 58 mm filters and an adapter elsewhere that were supposed to fit the Canon PowerShot SX line, but found that there is a slight change in the threading on the SX30IS from the earlier models.  This adapter fits like a glove whereas the other fit more like the infamous OJ glove (almost, but too tight to really go on).  The 58mm lenses easily mate up which makes this item essential for anyone who wants to get the most out of there SX30IS without paying 4X as much for the OEM adapter.

Reviews.Title: Neccessary
Reviews.Author: Lawrence Pim
Reviews.Content: Having done semi-pro SLR work I am a bit disappointed that Canon felt the need to do the proprietary route and require a special adapter to get standard accessories attached to the lens......... the Canon part was WAY dis-appointing. The adapter does work well.Larry

Reviews.Title: Works fine on SX50.
Reviews.Author: Donald M. Burt
Reviews.Content: Item arrived earlier than expected and performed as described on my SX50. A little snug to get on (after getting the slots lined up correctly), but that's better than loose. Camera lens closes normally and old lens caps fits fine with it on, so I'll leave it on permanently. I used a 58 to 52 step down ring to try a old Olympus C-180 teleconverter (1.7X and very light weight) on the camera, but the resulting images, while blown-up appropriately, contained no additional detail, so I'll only be using this adapter with normal filters.

Reviews.Title: Usable under certain conditions
Reviews.Author: Arie
Reviews.Content: I ordered this adapter for my canon sx 40 hs camera because I had some other 58mm lenses that I wanted to use with my new camera.It took a couple of minutes to figure out how to get it on, and once I did, I was disappointed. The adapter stays on, but if you tilt the camera downward too far or too quickly, it will fall right off. So, I only recommend buying this if you plan to use it every once in a while and if you aren't going to be tilting your camera up or down. I used it while doing some product photography and it was fine (but only because I only needed my camera to be horizontal 95% of the time)I will be keeping this adapter as a backup for my new adapter that my parents bought for me after this one didn't quite work, but I don't plan to use it on a regular basis.

Reviews.Title: Works like a charm!!!
Reviews.Author: Sharon O
Reviews.Content: Bought this adapter for my Canon SX40. Easy to install, fits snug. UV filter screwed on perfectly. I would purchase this again!

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed!
Reviews.Author: rdmae
Reviews.Content: The ring fit perfectly on my camera....was exactly what I needed and the micro fiber cloth is a wonderful bonus.  I am very impressed with the product and service and would definitely buy from this company again.

Reviews.Title: Great service after USPS lost item
Reviews.Author: C. Dube
Reviews.Content: After a 10-day delay without receiving a small adapter ring, I reported the delay to DigitalGoja. They informed me the part had been mailed, but sent me a second one overnight at no cost. The original part showed up 2 days later, postmarked 2 weeks earlier exactly as DigitalGoja claimed. They could easily have stiffed me, but showed great service attitude by covering the poor USPS handling in this case. Highly recommend DigitalGoja.

Reviews.Title: Perfect !
Reviews.Author: Alejandro Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: Adaptor fits perfectly, and the most important thing... service and attention by sellers staff is flawless, there was some issue with the mailing and they resolved it nicely, amiably and in a timely fashion. 100% recommended !

Reviews.Title: Great adapter
Reviews.Author: Bonnie T
Reviews.Content: ''This Lens Conversion Adapter worked perfectly for the Essential Kit with the 3 filters that I purchased for my Canon SX40 HS. I am always nervous about ordering items that I can't test to see if they fit right, so was very happy to see these fit perfectly and worked very well.I have had no problems at all, I ordered extra adapters for each lens so I don't have to keep putting them together. I would order from DigitalGoja again as I am very satisfied with the products and the service I received.''

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Shivkumar Jha "SJ"
Reviews.Content: Works great with SX50. Be patient as it fits snugly. I had to put a 58mm filter on it afterwards and the original lens cap will not fit to that filter. If you do not put a filter original lens cap will fit in just fine. When the product was delivered I got a personal typewritten letter from the seller for returning it if it does not work. No questions asked. This was really besides Amazon policy and a personal courtesy to the customer. Really impressed.

Reviews.Title: Good adapter for the Canon SX50
Reviews.Author: Retired Dave
Reviews.Content: Good quality and price. Slips onto the SX50 to provide 58mm threads so I may use my Digital Rebel lenses and accessories on this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Jerry Seen
Reviews.Content: Great product and with high standard quality. Better and cheaper than the orignal canon adaptor. Thanks to Goja for carrying this product to sell. Highly recommended  for user of SX50HS.

Reviews.Title: Canon SX50HS Adapter
Reviews.Author: Bronco245
Reviews.Content: I needed a UV filter for my new Canon SX50HS.  After trying unsuccessfully to find a filter that would fit the camera I found this adapter at a good price, with quick delivery and a perfect fit.

Reviews.Title: Fits SX40 HS
Reviews.Author: RoninUT
Reviews.Content: Ordered this adapter after a different seller sent one that didn't fit. This one fits. It appears to be well made. It could stand to be a little more snug, but it does the trick and holds filters in front of the lens. Be careful to hold the adapter ring while unscrewing filters so that the ring doesnt come off the camera. Repeated installation and removal could eventually cause wear on the lens and make it fit more loosely.

Reviews.Title: Easy on, easy off--for the SX40
Reviews.Author: Dragoncello
Reviews.Content: I already had 58mm filters from other cameras, so thought the product was worth a try given the price. Worked perfectly with the Canon SX40--screws on and off very easily. Well threaded to receive and remove the filters. Feels surprisingly sturdy. A warning, however: I've since bought the SX50, and it's a significantly tighter fit on that camera. Much harder to get on and off. You have to zoom the lens out and hold onto its barrel while you're putting on the adapter to make sure you don't put torque on the lens itself when you twist the adapter ring. In reality, it's probably not a bad idea to use that approach with the SX40, too, but more important with the SX50. Actually, it feels quite secure if you just push it onto the SX50 without twisting, sort of snapping it on and off, rather than twisting to lock, and I'll probably stick with that option.

Reviews.Title: Canon Adapter Ring
Reviews.Author: Kclkduff
Reviews.Content: This is exactly what I was looking for and it fits perfectly.1 of 58MM Lens Conversion Adapter Ring for CANON POWERSHOT SX20, SX30, SX40 IS Cameras +MagicFiber Microfiber Lens Cleaning Cloth [ASIN: B004F3OYQ4]

Reviews.Title: A good choice for your SX30
Reviews.Author: Hei
Reviews.Content: It's delivered earlier than the estimated time. Good Quality...It absolutely fits to Canon SX30. A good choice for your SX30 if you would like to add an UV filter to your SX30

Reviews.Title: NOT for the SX50 HS
Reviews.Author: Dizturbed One
Reviews.Content: This will work well for the SX40 and earlier, and it is cast in metal, not plastic. However, the SX50 is SLIGHTLY different on the barrel, not allowing this to mount properly. In no way will this fit on the SX50HS in stock form, the pressure it would exert on the barrel is too great. However, I was able to easily make it work by filing the inner diameter out slightly at a few key spots, and then sanding it smooth so it didn't damage the barrel. It works ok, and is very snug, but lacks a true locking detent with this modification. A small quibble for something so cheap. I rarely notice the lack of a detent unless I am in temperature swings that cause my filters to be hard to twist off due to expansion, a small negative of the metal construction.

Reviews.Title: quality product
Reviews.Author: big nate
Reviews.Content: This product is well built made from metal and fit right on with a positive feeling latch . Ready to rock and roll !!!

Reviews.Title: Works great with  the powershot sx50 hs
Reviews.Author: Alex Lovcraft
Reviews.Content: This adapter worked well for me.  While I initially  considered that I might need to purchase the 62mm adapter in the future when I had the spare funds to replace my current filters I now know this will not be necessary as the adapter has fit all of my adapting needs perfectlyA couple people in other reviews complained about being able to see the adapter ring in the edges of the shots but as I said, I already had filters in this size and a lack of excess funds so I purchased this adapter for now and planned to crop any edges that might be a problem.  But I never had this problem  I take quite a few shots with  the thicker circular polarizing filter and saw no evidence of it in any of my pictures.  It is possible that the edge of the filter is visible in wide angle shots when you are zoomed all the way out, but I almost always use a little zoom so have not seen this at all.My adapter did say Powershot SX30 on the packaging  but once I lined the adapter up with the slots on the edge of the lens barrel I had no problem with it being either too tight or too loose

Reviews.Title: Perfect Fit
Reviews.Author: Kathy Haire
Reviews.Content: This lens conversion adapter ring fit perfectly onto our SX30is. We can now use the 58mm polarizer with this camera. Item is as described and shipping was super fast.

Reviews.Title: ASO
Reviews.Author: ASO
Reviews.Content: Based on the price, I was expecting a plastic adapter but this is actually a high quality anodized aluminum adapter. The fit is perfect on my Canon SX40. There is even a slight "snap" when fully inserted on the camera giving me confidence that it won't fall off. The factory lens cap can still be used while the adapter is installed. This adapter does the job perfectly for next to nothing!

Reviews.Title: Great fit for the SX40 HS
Reviews.Author: warrior6901
Reviews.Content: Bought this adapter so I could use a filter for lens protection as well as photo effects. Mounted easily and quickly and accepted my 58mm filters with no problem.

Reviews.Title: Good glass
Reviews.Author: Junkbondman
Reviews.Content: Worked ok for SX50, tight fit. You should get the one specifically for the SX50 from this company. I didn't realize until I purchased that there was a specific SX50 version.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for lens covers
Reviews.Author: Wildernesstrekker
Reviews.Content: On time shipmentWorks and fits great.Had product before. Busboy dropped my camera breaking lens cover, but it saved my lens!A must for those adventurist photographers!

Reviews.Title: Does What It's Supposed To
Reviews.Author: Robert S. Papps
Reviews.Content: Good quality and does everything that I expected. Image quality does not appear to be effected when used with a quality filter.

Reviews.Title: fit my SX40
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Barnett
Reviews.Content: fit my SX40 camera like a dream, was able to attach a UV filter on adapter with no problem.  Takes a little effort to remove and install but this is fine since it will stay locked in place when installing lens cap and when you are removing camera from bag.  58mm size keep it close to same size as lens housing and makes it much better to handle.

Reviews.Title: Works as described
Reviews.Author: Cappy
Reviews.Content: The SX20 does not have a thread on the lens.This "Lens Conversion Adapter" uses what I assume was the mounts on the lens indented for the lens cover, it allows a 58MM filter to be attached to the SX20.  My SX20 is a few years old.  This allows me to put a clear filter over the lens to protect the lens.Used it for several days of shooting outside and it worked fine.

Reviews.Title: adapter ring
Reviews.Author: Jamille Ilha
Reviews.Content: Good quality product, it fits perfect my camera and hold the lenses very well! It's made out a good material, I recommend!

Reviews.Title: WOULD NOT FIT
Reviews.Author: JMAC
Reviews.Content: I have purchased items from Goja before and they are a GREAT company. However the adaptor ring I received did not fit my Canon SX50HS. I contacted Goja about the fit of this Kiwi brand adapter. They told me it should fit and instructed me on the proper installation procedure. After several attempts it still would not fit.Goja issued me a total refund without the hassle of returning it. On top of that I also kept the micro fiber cleaning cloth.Because of that I'm giving it 2 stars instead of one.

Reviews.Title: Good quality adaptor on SX50
Reviews.Author: Larry Lee
Reviews.Content: This adaptor is made of metal,(not the loose fitting plastic junk), This one fits very snug and snaps into place, like it should. I have used other adaptors,(some metal) on my SX30 and SX1 IS,they didn't fit like this well made piece. it stays in place even when I am removing a hood or filter. I hope it's this tight after lots of use. The real test will be holding my Cokin P filter system or ring flash unit:  Larry

Reviews.Title: 58mm adaptor ring
Reviews.Author: mcdoggone
Reviews.Content: Works perfectly, on my sx50. Just set the camera on its back so you are looking down at the lens mount, match up the ring, snap it in and give it a clockwise twist to lock it. Stays completely secure. Digital Goja is a great company to deal with.

Reviews.Title: Works on SX20
Reviews.Author: J. E. Noynaert
Reviews.Content: I ordered this with a bit of concern.  Although the SX20 is listed in the title, the technical details did not include the SX20.  But the adapter worked just fine on my SX20.

Reviews.Title: perfect fit- half the price
Reviews.Author: Marianne Gordon
Reviews.Content: This ring is awesome -fits nicely and the filters ,lens hood and cap were all integrated smoothly.This is much cheaper than lensmate and very well made.

Reviews.Title: Excellent fit for SX-20
Reviews.Author: Kayak Lite
Reviews.Content: Lens adapter fits nice and snug on my SX20 and my filter screwed on nice and smoothly. I'm impressed by the value for the price I paid. The price included shipping and a complimentary magic wipe lens cloth. I placed the order at night and the item was shipped first class the next day.

Reviews.Title: Lens Conversion Ring for Canon SX40 is great!
Reviews.Author: Karen Collins
Reviews.Content: I do sometimes use UV and polarizing filters with my digital cameras.  In order to use the filters with the Canon SX40, it is necessary to have an adapter ring so I purchased the 58mm lens conversion adapter ring from Digital Goja.  The adapter ring is metal, not plastic and very easily twists onto the camera.  It fits snugly and does not wobble and the filters thread onto the adapter ring very snugly.  I am quite pleased with the quality of this adapter ring and would recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Mark A. Belcher "marksenterprizes"
Reviews.Content: works with sx30 great ,fit lens then all you need filters and filter cap,makes it look and feel like slr

Reviews.Title: Good adapter ring
Reviews.Author: Ricardo Guardia
Reviews.Content: Great product. I purchased this adapter ring for my Canon to add a protective lens filter and it works perfect with my Canon SX30. El adaptador funciona muy bien con mi cámara canon SX30.

Reviews.Title: Perfect fit!
Reviews.Author: pongnut
Reviews.Content: Some of the reviews led me to believe that this adapter was a press fit or screwed in, but it actually locks in by lining up with the machined recess on the front of the lens barrel and turning a ¼ turn – at least on my SX40 HS.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Converter Ring!
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: I used this on my Canon Powershot sx40 and paired it with some zeikos lens filters and a basic lens cap, does what it needs to do, just what I was looking for!

Reviews.Title: 100% recommended
Reviews.Author: Timothy Lucero
Reviews.Content: Fantastic!!!!!!!!!!!!!Adaptor fits perfectly, and thats the most important thing. im going to buy more soon 1 for ever lens i have

Reviews.Title: One Isn't Enough!
Reviews.Author: KMSROX "--Kimmie Sharon"
Reviews.Content: I use these on my Canon SX40 HS so I can add lenses and other attachments freely and easily. I was very happy to find this adapter was available without ordering a kit because while this adapter is one of my main accessories the things that come in the kits are basically throw aways.I have purchased about 5 of these adapters and all are perfect fits, no cross threading, no slippage and no time consuming fidgeting while switching lenses.You can not go wrong with this adapter therefore I would recommend it for anyone that wishes to use other lenses or attachments on their Canon SX40 HS.

Reviews.Title: fits well
Reviews.Author: ged 1
Reviews.Content: Despite what other reviews may say, it is not hard to fit on the lens and takes filters well.  I bought 2  in order to keep them on my grad nd and circ. polar. filters all the time. It is minor that it does take some effort to remove a variable ring filter from the ring adapter.

Reviews.Title: for Canon ( non canon) adapter ring 58mm
Reviews.Author: Al Schissler   (photobigal) on ebay
Reviews.Content: for a fraction of what canon charges get the benefit of using filters on the SX 40 I own.So i can use anything I prefer  and have the same use as I have on my DSLRsPolarizers or any special effects sought for creative photography.  Using a split neutal density filter or any  other special effectis great.

Reviews.Title: 58mm lens adapter
Reviews.Author: Radar
Reviews.Content: Got this for my son to use on his Canon SX. He has not had any issues with it. Works great as expected.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: James A. Richard
Reviews.Content: I have a Canon SX40 and have a 67mm adapter and UV lens and it works well but at wide angle 24mm with the flash I get a shadow in the bottom center of the picture unless I zoom it out a little...So I thought that I would try the 58mm and see what was up with it... So far so good with no shadows except if you try and double up on lens filers... like putting a polaroid filter in front of a UV... Then some shadows show up in the corners... no big deal, just use one filter at a time... Either have the polaroid or uv on at any given time...You could have 2 of these adapters as the bayonet mount goes on and comes off faster than screwing filters on and off...If you only use a uv like many do just for protection then you are golden..  There is no need for me to explain what polaroid or any other filters do because if you have extra filters then you already know...But getting back to this adapter.. It works and I am not sure if plastic is better than metal (metal could scratch a finish putting it on or off.) Strength is not a critical factor here and so a plastic/nylon or synthetic works just fine for what it does and that is just to hold a filter on the lens...

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: A. T. Cleghorn
Reviews.Content: Works great with my new Canon Powershot 40SX.  I use it to place a filter on my camera lens to keep the lens from getting damaged.  :)

Reviews.Title: Worth a 5 Star Rating
Reviews.Author: Rich Barger
Reviews.Content: Good service, good price & the product fit is excellent !Have purchased a competitors adapter in the past at about 3 times the price, so finding this company was really a blessing.Already referred this product/company to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Very nicely made with the correct bayonet fitting for the Canon SX20, SX40 and SX50
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice 58mm filter adapter for the Canon cameras noted above.  A small issue is that the filter adapter fits rather loosely and could not be "locked" into place.  Consequently, this adapter does not work well with cirucular polarizing filters since you have to turn them to get the lighting effect you want.  The previous version of this adapter was so tight you could only snap it on and not turn it, but it sure stays in place.

Reviews.Title: Solid metal adapter fits perfectly on SX40
Reviews.Author: Tim H,
Reviews.Content: Solid, nicely-machined metal adapter fits perfectly on my Canon SX40. Now I can protect the lens with a UV filter, or use any other DSLR filter. The lens cleaning cloth is a nice bonus. Fast shipping. Great customer service. I'm buying more camera gadgets here.

Reviews.Title: adapter working fine. but a lens cleaning cloth is a waste.
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: adapter working fine. magic fiber cloth i dont expect this to do any magic. atleast it should clean my lens.you will see lot of particles left in your lens after using this cloth. dont use it.

Reviews.Title: Great Product even better company
Reviews.Author: Keri
Reviews.Content: Adapter ring fits great. I am really impressed with Digital Goja their customer service and personal attention is second to none. They are phenomenal. Walter Goja and his team take the time to make sure your purchase is perfect.  I highly recommend this company.

Reviews.Title: adaptor
Reviews.Author: Ilona Benzel "Lonnie"
Reviews.Content: I had no idea I needed this conversion adapter ring for the camera to add otherlenses so I'm really happy I found it. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Fit like a glove
Reviews.Author: David F. Scrivens
Reviews.Content: I ordered what said was a 58mm lens adapter from another seller that said it would fit my Cannon SX40 but I couldn't get it on my camera no matter how hard I tried. When I saw this one I said why not give it a try as it said it would fit (of course the other seller said that too) and when it got here I had no problem putting it on and it fit tight. Love it and finally found a dealer that I can rely on.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: RebeccaVDB
Reviews.Content: Very nice lens conversion adapter ring. I purchased this adapter for my Canon SX40 to add a protective lens filter and it works perfect.

Reviews.Title: Fast!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Barber
Reviews.Content: The service was great. I was surprised when I got my mail that it was already there. I'm very excited to be able to use my old filters and was pleased that it was so easy to get the adapter and for a decent price.

Reviews.Title: as described
Reviews.Author: geezery
Reviews.Content: adapted ring was metal as described and fit the lens without any problems and the filters have no problem fitting into its threads. It arrived on 1st day of arrival window.

Reviews.Title: as promised
Reviews.Author: chuckto
Reviews.Content: received as promissed item quality good  a little "tricky" to mount but common sence applies haven,t tried any mounts except lens cover

Reviews.Title: Nice fit for SX40
Reviews.Author: Michael Legato
Reviews.Content: The adapter fit nicely on my wife's SX40. She had several 58mm filters from her old S3-IS. Her only complaint is that it could have fit a bit more tightly, but I think that's a function of the camera more than the adapter.  Very fast shipment from Goja!

ProductInfo.Features:
Includes: 58MM Lens Conversion Adapter for CANON PowerShot SX40 HS & SX30 IS + Premium MagicFiber Microfiber Cleaning Cloth
Backed with DigitalGoja 30-Day 100% Satisfaction Guarantee.
ProductInfo.Name: 58MM Lens Conversion Adapter Ring for CANON POWERSHOT SX20, SX30, SX40 IS Digital Cameras + MagicFiber Microfiber Lens Cleaning Cloth
